author: Mostajab Ali Khan
comment: Can't find it anywhere not in widgets , wallpapers ,  apps or themes

reply.author: i3wear developers, S.L.
reply.content: Hi! This app is a watch face for Android smart watch. You need the official Google application "Android Wear". All watch faces (including Dark Analog Free Watch Face) are installed within that application.

title: How do you apply this

author: David Thatcher
comment: Finally a high contrast analogue watch face. This is exactly the simplicity and functionality I wanted. Thank you developers! Keep going! -  see Hamilton mil spec watches of Vietnam war era for ideas along this line.

reply.author: i3wear developers, S.L.
reply.content: Hi! Thank you very much for your words! We are pleased by your satisfaction. The watch that you mentioned looks really nice. We appreciate your observation! It's in our mind explore designs in this line.

title: Yes!
